AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Due to [PAWN_nameDef]'s intellectual potential, [PAWN_pronoun] was put in charge of doing little research projects to challenge themselves and build up a passion for it, so that [PAWN_pronoun] could be useful to their society. Though none of those projects involved animals or living creatures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space-scientist assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a family with high passion for science. [PAWN_possessive] parents always wanted [PAWN_nameDef] to learn from them, so [PAWN_pronoun] was continuously asked for help, even if they were little tasks.\n\nSadly, [PAWN_nameDef]'s parent didn't let [PAWN_pronoun] focus on other things that weren't scientific topics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-assembler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always had a passion for machines and computers. [PAWN_nameDef] would assemble and disassemble them again just to know how they work. [PAWN_possessive]'s focus was mainly on non-living things, leaving socializing with others apart. \n\nFortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], being part of a space-travelling race let them gather an immeasurable amount of knowledge thanks to their technology.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-vet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always had a passion for the anatomy and organic proccesses of any living creatures. Not only that, but [PAWN_pronoun] always worried about them being hurt, so [PAWN_nameDef] studied a lot to be able to cure and heal them as much as [PAWN_pronoun] could. \n\nFortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] was part of a space-travelling race, so [PAWN_nameDef] could gather an immeasurable amount of knowledge thanks to not only being able to meet their planet's lifeforms, but from other planets as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As [PAWN_nameDef]'s race developed new techologies and space-travelling, [PAWN_pronoun] proposed themself to become a leader for any space-travelling mission. [PAWN_nameDef] focused on social skills and gathered as much information as possible about contacting other sapient species and how to comunicate with them with proper technology.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young spaceship builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In [PAWN_nameDef]'s early ages, [PAWN_pronoun] was impressed by their race's civilization and technology advanced enough to do space-travelling. [PAWN_nameDef] always wanted to know how it worked, so [PAWN_pronoun] studied hard on spaceships, physics, and astronomy, so [PAWN_pronoun] could help in building some of those transport structures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s race history is rich and full of dramatic stories. From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef], fascinated by this, took sculpting as a way of expressing these interests. Though, [PAWN_possessive] sculptures were far greater than those known on average planets due to [PAWN_nameDef]'s race advanced technology. \n\nAlso, [PAWN_nameDef] developed [PAWN_possessive] skill at crafting the art tools [PAWN_pronoun] needed to use.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a space-cook that travelled through galaxies looking for odd creatures to kill and butcher so he could sell their meat and leather. [PAWN_nameDef] developed a passion for cooking thanks to [PAWN_possessive] father's work. Anytime [PAWN_pronoun] could, [PAWN_pronoun] would look at what was [PAWN_possessive] father cooking, how he prepared the food, and how to skin an animal's leather.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young space-soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The government kept [PAWN_nameDef] away from [PAWN_possessive] family since [PAWN_pronoun] was a child so [PAWN_pronoun] could be effectively trained. \n\nThough the training involved combat capabilities, [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't every able to form any serious relationship with others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trained child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Due to [PAWN_nameDef]'s civilization constant wars with other planets, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained trained just in case [PAWN_possessive] help was needed in the battlefield. Though, [PAWN_possessive] wasn't as hard as others, so [PAWN_nameDef]'s social abilities weren't crippled.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young Athlete
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From a young age [PAWN_nameDef] demonstrated promise in sports, from fencing to running. [PAWN_possessive] physical prowess led them to gain admission in prestigious glitterworld schools, in order to increase their prestige. Enrollment hasn't done wonders for [PAWN_possessive] education though, as [PAWN_pronoun] was always busy training for the next big event.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Private Kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Enrolled in the best institutions that money could buy, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up pampered by those very glitterworld schools. From the very beginning, [PAWN_pronoun] believed that they would be heads and shoulders above the common man. Thus [PAWN_pronoun] disdains laboring like urbworld urchins, instead preferring to flaunt [PAWN_possessive] exalted social skills and intellect.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Voracious Reader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: If there's one point of pride for [PAWN_nameDef], it was the sheer extent of [PAWN_possessive] learnedness. [PAWN_pronoun] often found books more approachable than actual friends, delving into the esoteric as a form of self-challenge. While this has made [PAWN_objective] erudite, it also has made [PAWN_objective] the target of those with considerably less brain mass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] couldn't remember the first time [PAWN_pronoun]'d ever been on a cooking show, but [PAWN_pronoun] did recall the first dish she'd ever made. Ever since then, [PAWN_pronoun] has become a local celebrity, dazzling [PAWN_possessive] neighbors with fresh cuts and veggies. Unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] could scarcely remember another child [PAWN_possessive] age that wasn't a competitor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Model Builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It's the way that the models were built, how they could be posed, that attracted [PAWN_nameDef] to model building. From scaled-down replicas to poseable robots and even plastic children's bricks, [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for piecing them together. [PAWN_possessive] often joked how [PAWN_pronoun] was their little architect; with how much passion [PAWN_nameDef] babbled about [PAWN_possessive] project to equally passionate friends, it wasn't far from the truth.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Paintball Captain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Though [PAWN_nameDef] started as a delinquent, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually turned [PAWN_possessive] angst towards guns- paintball guns. Gathering equally dissatisfied youth around [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_pronoun] fought it out with them in red, blue and green. Years of this led to many turning to [PAWN_objective] for the next paintball competition, granting [PAWN_pronoun] ample opportunity to modify [PAWN_possessive] airgun and sharpen [PAWN_possessive] aim.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scion's Aide
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From birth, [PAWN_nameDef]'s role was to serve a capricious master as their eyes, hands and feet. [PAWN_possessive] eyes had to become adept at understanding [PAWN_possessive] often ill-mannered behavior, while [PAWN_possessive] learned how to be as silver-tongued as a merchant for [PAWN_possessive] own sake.. Despite [PAWN_possessive] best efforts, though, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_objective] replaced as soon as a new toy entered [PAWN_possessive] master's eyes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pottery Student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Enchanted by ancient terran claywork, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early days working with earth and water. [PAWN_possessive] teacher emphasized understanding how materials could affect the final product, so [PAWN_pronoun] often traveled to nature parks to quarry some earth and stone. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually developed the beginnings of an artstyle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Adopted Offworlder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The child of urbworlders, [PAWN_nameDef] was left in an orphanage following a freak spacecraft accident. [PAWN_possessive] caretakers disdained medicine, but preached the goodness of labor. By the time [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted by a kindly glitterworld family, [PAWN_nameDef] had learned to be quick with [PAWN_possessive] hands and exacting in [PAWN_possessive] designs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Herbal Brewer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Suffering from the stress of glitterworld academics, [PAWN_nameDef] found solace in consuming herbal remedies. [PAWN_pronoun] experiments with gardening provided an ample supply of potent ingredients that [PAWN_prounoun] would use liberally. From maintaining alertness to salving pain, [PAWN_possessive] remedies would be purchased by other students. However, the time [PAWN_pronoun] spent in concocting medicines was often taken from the time [PAWN_pronoun] required to study.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Marine soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has gone through countless battles because of [PAWN_possessive] race's intergalactic wars despite [PAWN_nameDef] not wanting to participate at all. \n\nSuch situations worsen [PAWN_possessive] mental health drastically.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space-researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] led multiple research projects for many years. Some of them were successful, [PAWN_pronoun] made important discoveries for [PAWN_possessive] race; some of them weren't as influential as others, and turned out to be just a waste of time. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a lot of pressure, often caused by [PAWN_possessive] important role on the research team.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked hard on important construction projects for space-travelling. [PAWN_nameDef] studied astrophysics and programming. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to improve the current navigation system most of their spaceships had.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Offworld veterinarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled through countless planets and galaxies. Explored their fauna and studied different strange biological systems from various animals. [PAWN_nameDef] cared so much about wildlife that [PAWN_pronoun] developed innovative procedures to cure animal diseases and wounds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bionics engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There's no getting around it- [PAWN_nameDef] has a fascination with the merger between man and machine. Making flesh whole again with steel and servos has always tickled [PAWN_possessive] fancy. In service of that passion, [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to crafting new appendages- for war or health, [PAWN_pronoun] cares not.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shaft Supervisor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Much of the raw material that has gone into the splendor of glitterworlds has come from megashafts- tunnels far below the surface of the planet. There lies the former playground of one [PAWN_nameDef], whose role is to guide automated mining bots to carve out stone and other riches. By combining [PAWN_possessive] intuition with the unrelenting nature of the bots, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to meet [PAWN_possessive] bottom line in the safety of his apartment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Environment Manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: If other planets hope to welcome aliens, they need to employ environment managers. Through careful monitoring of environmental conditions, [PAWN_nameDef] prevents aliens from suffering a grisly fate- desiccation from photon overexposure, nitrous poisoning, etcetera. Such skills also enable [PAWN_objective] to manage the lush artificial biomes of nature parks on the fly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Civil lawyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: With nearly every need fulfilled on glitterworlds, individuals from cunning humans to the many-eared Auditryns have partaken in their favorite pastime: civil lawsuits. That’s where [PAWN_nameDef], a soldier in the legal war of words, comes in. From espionage to the destruction of incriminating evidence, [PAWN_pronoun] has done it all. The only thing that matters to [PAWN_objective] is that [PAWN_possessive] client wins- and that [PAWN_pronoun] gets a cut of the earnings.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Westerns Actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: To [PAWN_nameDef], true art lies in the history of the old terran Wild West. That slight cocksure posture, the rough yet savvy eyes, and the trigger-happy machismo- [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn’t have it any other way. It took years of study to emulate the charisma and skill of those gunslingers, but [PAWN_possessive] work let [PAWN_objective] bring those memories to the big screen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Specialty Herder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The delectable honeysuckle aftertaste of Impervasio insect jelly; the through marbling of Panyu venison; these and more are the result of glitterworld specialty herders. Taking charge of animals and breeding them over generations, [PAWN_nameDef] has made a living serving wealthy gourmands true delicacies. From the homes that [PAWN_possessive] herds shelter in before the slaughter, to [PAWN_possessive] repertoire of recipes, [PAWN_nameDef] how to make a fine meal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deathmatch Space-fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Though some glitterworld denizens prefer slick and span idols and entertainers, some search for more primal amusement. [PAWN_nameDef] would know, as [PAWN_pronoun]'s taken part in brutal hand-to-hand deathmatches. [PAWN_pronoun] has ceased to count how many times [PAWN_possessive] skull has been caved in, only to be restored by a resurrector mech serum from [PAWN_possessive] sponsor. Perhaps that's why [PAWN_possessive] social and intellectual capabilities are generously described as subnormal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space-virologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Given the level of technological advancement that glitterworlds possess, medical researchers have a glut of topics to investigate. One such person is [PAWN_nameDef], a virologist who works with other alien species. [PAWN_possessive] studies have prevented pandemics from sweeping over the idyllic lives of glitterworld citizens, from animal genomic analysis to viral transmission simulations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naturecarver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Many designers, in the face of excessive consumerism, have latched onto the concept of green buildings. [PAWN_nameDef] is one of them, embracing a vision where nature and high-tech are entwined in harmony. Unfortunately, even with the aid of AI technical engineers, [PAWN_pronoun] has to accept some glaring compromises to [PAWN_possessive] vision.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Neolithicite
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As glitterworld citizens have come more in contact with nature-harmonizing races such as the Chorllytes, some have decided to embrace a more primitive lifestyle… without fully committing. [PAWN_nameDef] is one of those neolithicites (derogatory), hoping to become attuned to the natural world while catching up with their favorite streamers. [PAWN_possessive] experiences have only taught [PAWN_objective] the romance of the wilderness, and very little of the actual work required.
